page.title: 08Sandroyd School
page.content: {Sandroyd School}is situated in the{400 {acre Rushmore Park.}The main building, originally belonging to the{Pitt- {Rivers}family was constructed in{1888. As a prep school it has the advantages of smaller classes and competent staff . It is not co-ed as activities are easier to arrange with just boys. The fees for the{110-120}boys vary from {Â£1,100 to Â£1,300 per term}depending on the number of extras. The parents consider an education away from home a good training for later life. The most important subject is{English},includ- ing the art of communication, both oral and written. The school has a good{C.E. and scholarship}success rate and the opportunity given to the boys to learn about the{natural history}of the area is one of its main attract- ions. {(AUTHOR:E.Cook)
